thread.section_title: Rutlands.co.uk Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.rutlands.co.uk
thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text: My purchased was a very good deal, I suspect end-of-the-line so I grabbed it while it was still available and am satisfied. Customer service and delivery has always been top notch. However, it is sad to see the quality of some items appear to diminish, to be sure I believe this is an industry wide phenomenon due to lower quality steel and manufacturers cutting margins etc rather than Rutlands.
